properties.entry: INSERT INTO MARKET ( MARKET_NO , MARKET_WRITER , CATEGORY , D_CATEGORY , MARKET_TITLE , MARKET_CONTENT , PRICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MARNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
